svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Shown is the absolute number of deaths of children under the age of 5, by cause.
Source: IHME Global Burden of Disease
Note: The number of live births has increased over this period. It is useful to compare deaths as a share of live births.
